channel.title: Client Error when loading
channel.description:
Anyone know how to fix this? It loads everything correct but this pops up before it loads the game login screen... :confused:
[code] basic: Referencing classloader: sun.plugin.ClassLoaderInfo@17590db, refcount=1 basic: Loading applet ... basic: Initializing applet ... basic: Starting applet ... basic: completed perf rollup network: Connecting socket://localhost:43595 with proxy=DIRECT basic: Stopping applet ... basic: Finding information ... basic: Releasing classloader: sun.plugin.ClassLoaderInfo@17590db, refcount=0 basic: Caching classloader: sun.plugin.ClassLoaderInfo@17590db basic: Current classloader cache size: 1 basic: Done ... basic: Joining applet thread ... basic: Destroying applet ... basic: Disposing applet ... basic: Quiting applet ... basic: Joined applet thread ... basic: Referencing classloader: sun.plugin.ClassLoaderInfo@16b6c55, refcount=1 basic: Loading applet ... basic: Initializing applet ... basic: Starting applet ... basic: completed perf rollup network: Cache entry not found [url: http://client.perenolde-exodus.com/signed_app.jar, version: null] network: Connecting http://client.perenolde-exodus.com/signed_app.jar with proxy=DIRECT network: Connecting socket://localhost:43595 with proxy=DIRECT java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4488) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) basic: Exception: java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4488) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) network: Downloading resource: http://client.perenolde-exodus.com/signed_app.jar Content-Length: 356,680 Content-Encoding: null network: Wrote URL http://client.perenolde-exodus.com/signed_app.jar to File C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\cache\6.0\30\701c401e-4d7718b6-temp security: Loading Deployment certificates from C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\security\trusted.certs security: Loaded Deployment certificates from C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\security\trusted.certs security: Loading certificates from Deployment session certificate store security: Loaded certificates from Deployment session certificate store security: Validate the certificate chain using CertPath API security: Obtain certificate collection in Root CA certificate store security: Obtain certificate collection in Root CA certificate store security: The CRL support is enabled security: This certificate does not have CRL extension security: Use CRL setting from certificate security: The OCSP support is enabled security: This certificate does not have AIA extension security: Use OCSP setting from certificate security: No timestamping info available security: Checking if certificate is in Deployment denied certificate store security: Checking if certificate is in Deployment permanent certificate store security: Checking if certificate is in Deployment session certificate store security: User has granted the priviledges to the code forever security: Loading Deployment certificates from C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\security\trusted.certs security: Loaded Deployment certificates from C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\security\trusted.certs security: Adding certificate in Deployment permanent certificate store security: Added certificate in Deployment permanent certificate store as alias deploymentusercert$tsflag2817430585939946324 security: Saving Deployment certificates in C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\security\trusted.certs security: Saved Deployment certificates in C:\Documents and Settings\HP_Administrator\Application Data\Sun\Java\Deployment\security\trusted.certs network: Connecting socket://localhost:43595 with proxy=DIRECT [/code]
Then I get a connection error... retrying in __ seconds.

item.title: Client Error when loading
item.dc:creator: @octavius octavius
item.description:
@octavius wrote:

Anyone know how to fix this? It loads everything correct but this pops up before it loads the game login screen…
